fields.headline: It's official
fields.bodyText: According to your poll (April 5), with 63% of the population opposed to Labour, Blair can still expect to return to government with a majority of 100 seats. This, a day after the governing party has been caught stuffing ballots. And we dare lecture Mugabe about fair elections? Jonathan Miller Alfold, Surrey Now that it's official, will you spare us the daily spin and photo opportunities by relegating them to a daily election special which can be discarded in the bin. Steve Dey Dousland, Devon So it's to be May 5, Ascension Day. Is Tony Blair preparing to leave us? Michael Horan East Grinstead, W Sussex
